div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActSite where concept is-a _HumanActSite
Import all the codes that are contained in Dentition
Import all the codes that are contained in HumanSubstanceAdministrationSite

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActSite
CodeDisplayDefinition
_HumanActSiteHumanActSiteAn anatomical location on a human which can be the focus of an act.

Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActSite
CodeDisplayDefinition
_HumanSubstanceAdministrationSiteHumanSubstanceAdministrationSiteThe set of body locations to or through which a drug product may be administered.

description.value:
An anatomical location on a human which can be the focus of an act.
*OpenIssue:* This value set was approved for **deletion** in November 2008, and was deleted at release \#762. Subsequently, however, it was found that this deletion caused the legacy software embedded in the RMIM Designer in Visio to fail to show appropriate options for concepts in the subject area of this value set. For that reason, the value set was **re-added in releasse 813 and DEPRECATED from general use** at the same time. This value set should be deleted as soon as it is no longer required to support of the legacy software.
